metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9992 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the decode_dds1 function in libavcodec/dfa.c in FFmpeg before 2.8.12, 3.0.x before 3.0.8, 3.1.x before 3.1.8, 3.2.x before 3.2.5, and 3.3.x before 3.3.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
